definition[0]: to become more exciting, or to make an event become more exciting
example[0]: The party really livened up when Mattie arrived.
example[1]: Why don’t we invite Jane? That’ll liven things up!
definition[1]: to make something look, taste etc more interesting
example[2]: Why not liven up the room with some flowers?
definition[2]: to become more interested or excited, or to make someone feel like this
example[3]: After a few drinks she livened up a little.
